Variable.name: VTStatus
Variable.RefinementScript: function refine(list) { var x; var y=false; var names=list.toArray(); for(x in names) { println(names[x]); if(names[x].indexOf("Epis_VT") != -1) y=true; } return y; }

EligibilityCriteria.EvaluationScript: function EligibleToGuidelineCriterion(VTStatus) { if ( VTStatus.getValue().getText() == "true") return true; else return false; }

tr.th: Does the patient regularly takes the medications?

script.content: function generate(ehrMeds, phrMeds) { var e; var p; var output = ''; for(e=0; e'; var useIt = 'No'; for(p=0; p'; } } var line = '' + ehrMed.getText() + ':' + ehrMed.getDoseQuantity() + ' mg' + '' + useIt + '' + ''; output = output + line; output = output + ''; } return output; }

Variable.name: Vomit
Variable.RefinementScript: function refine(list) { var x="no"; var y=0; var names=list.toArray(); for(var i=0; i < names.length;i++) { var problem = names[i]; var effectiveTimeHigh = problem.getEffectiveTimeHigh(); if(!isActiveDate(effectiveTimeHigh)) continue; if(problem.getProblemValue() != null) if(problem.getProblemValue().equals("C0042963")) y=y+1; } if(y>0) { x="yes"; } return x; }

Variable.name: Diarrhea
Variable.RefinementScript: function refine(list) { var x="no"; var y=0; var names=list.toArray(); for(var i=0; i < names.length;i++) { var problem = names[i]; var effectiveTimeHigh = problem.getEffectiveTimeHigh(); if(!isActiveDate(effectiveTimeHigh)) continue; if(problem.getProblemValue() != null) if(problem.getProblemValue().equals("C0011991")) y=y+1; } if(y>0) { x="yes"; } return x; }

Variable.name: ChestPain
Variable.RefinementScript: function refine(list) { var x="no"; var y=0; var names=list.toArray(); for(var i=0; i < names.length;i++) { var problem = names[i]; var effectiveTimeHigh = problem.getEffectiveTimeHigh(); if(!isActiveDate(effectiveTimeHigh)) continue; if(problem.getProblemValue() != null) if(problem.getProblemValue().equals("C0042963")) y=y+1; } if(y>0) { x="yes"; } return x; }

Variable.name: ShortnessofBreath
Variable.RefinementScript: function refine(list) { var x="no"; var y=0; var names=list.toArray(); for(var i=0; i < names.length;i++) { var problem = names[i]; var effectiveTimeHigh = problem.getEffectiveTimeHigh(); if(!isActiveDate(effectiveTimeHigh)) continue; if(problem.getProblemValue() != null) if(problem.getProblemValue().equals("C0008031")) y=y+1; } if(y>0) { x="yes"; } return x; }

Variable.name: WeightGain
Variable.RefinementScript: function refine(list) { var x="no"; var y=0; var names=list.toArray(); for(var i=0; i < names.length;i++) { var problem = names[i]; var effectiveTimeHigh = problem.getEffectiveTimeHigh(); if(!isActiveDate(effectiveTimeHigh)) continue; if(problem.getProblemValue() != null) if(problem.getProblemValue().equals("C0043094")) y=y+1; } if(y>0) { x="yes"; } return x; }

Variable.name: Fever
Variable.RefinementScript: function refine(list) { var x="no"; var y=0; var names=list.toArray(); for(var i=0; i < names.length;i++) { var problem = names[i]; var effectiveTimeHigh = problem.getEffectiveTimeHigh(); if(!isActiveDate(effectiveTimeHigh)) continue; if(problem.getProblemValue() != null) if(problem.getProblemValue().equals("C0015967")) y=y+1; } if(y>0) { x="yes"; } return x; }

Variable.name: LastLabResultDate
Variable.RefinementScript: function refine(list) { var names=list.toArray(); if(names == null || names.length == 0) { return ': 175 days ago'; } var labResult = names[0]; var effectiveTime = labResult.getEffectiveTime(); var dayDiff=dayDifference(effectiveTime); effectiveTime = effectiveTime + ': ' + dayDiff + ' days ago.'; return effectiveTime; }

Variable.name: LabAbnormality
Variable.RefinementScript: function refine() { var y = $Sodium < 135 || $Sodium > 148 || $Chloride < 97 || $Chloride > 108 || $Potassium < 3.9 || $Potassium > 5.4 || $Hemoglobin < 11.7 || $Hemoglobin > 15.7 || $Creatinine < 0.5 || $Creatinine > 1.1 || $Troponin >14; return y;}

Variable.RefinementScript: function refine(list) { var x; var y="false"; var names=list.toArray(); for(var i=0; i < names.length;i++) { y="true"; } return y; }

p.b: Brief Information about the patient

Last Follow-up Date: Access to previous Remote follow-up results

tr.name: CIEDBlock
tr.td:
Brief Information about the recent alarm Received Date:
VT Episode
Access to Report Exported

p.b: Brief Information about the Patient History retrieved from EHR

b.font: Recommendation and Next Step to follow

td.p:
If patient has LV dysfunction due to prior myocardial infarction prescribe amiodarone + / - beta-blockers (class IIa, level of evidence B) or sotalol (class IIa, level of evidence C) or consider Catheter ablation (class IIb, level of evidence B)
If patient has Dilated cardiomyopathy (nonischemic) prescribe amiodarone + / - beta-blockers (class IIa, level of evidence B)
If patient has Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy prescribe Amiodarone (class IIa, level of evidence C)
If patient has Arrhythmogenic right ventricular cardiomyopathy prescribe Amiodarone (class IIa, level of evidence C)or Sotalol (class IIa, level of evidence C).
If patient has Heart failure prescribe Amiodarone + / - beta-blocker (class I, level of evidence C) or Sotalol (class I, level of evidence C).
If patient has Long QT syndrome prescribe Beta-blockers.
If patient has Brugada Syndrome consider Electrical storm: isoproterenol (class IIa, level of evicence C) or Electrical storm: quinidine (class IIb, level of evidence C
If patient has Valvular heart disease check if the patient is a candidate for valvular repair / replacement, No specific drug suggested by guidelines.

NextStep.name: Wait 1 week to see if medication change is effective
